WorkItem.ClosedComment: What do you mean by can't debug? Source maps are created by the Typescript compiler to help a debugger map the currently executing JavaScript to it's corresponding Typescript source code. Once you have minified the JavaScript that map no longer makes sense and you would need to debug the minified JavaScript. Please re-open this if I'm misunderstanding or there's some other solution you had in mind.
